name: Shoot 2022 (skeptile)
description:
Shoot 2022 is a spiritual successor and homage to one of my favorite classic Game Maker games, Shoot 2008 by Erik Leppen. I made this little prototype several years ago, and recently rediscovered it and decided to spend a day or two polishing it up just enough to create a functional product. I might update it with new enemies and powerups in the future if I have time.

Description:
Blast enemy drones by the hundreds in this endless arcade shmup, collecting and combining powerups to survive as long as you can. There are 30 powerups and 11 drone types to discover.

Controls:
Mouse to move
Mouse wheel to select a powerup and Right-click to activate it
You can also use the number keys to activate powerups, or click the little boxes.
M to toggle music, or click the little music icon
If the window is too big, press F1 to toggle to a smaller view.

Credits:
Code, music, and "art" by me (skeptile)

Note: I'm not sure how to get INI files working with the HTML5 module, so for now your High Score will be lost upon leaving  or reloading the page.
